name: Farrier
description: A specialist in horse hoof care and shoeing; adventurers can have their mounts tended to, learn about equine health, or find evidence of unusual hoof injuries.
atmosphere: The forge is filled with the sound of hammers striking metal and the earthy scent of horses and hot iron. The air carries the promise of care and the essential bond between rider and mount, while the atmosphere is one of skilled craftsmanship and the importance of proper hoof care.
